short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Saving the timestamps in YT videos

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It's a handy extension for you to better watch YouTube videos, movies. You can set as many as possible timestamp bookmarks in the videos, so next time you know from where to continue to watch, or you might as well set timestamps for some brilliant scenes, so you can quickly jump there at any time to enjoy only those wonderful clips you have much interest in!
